messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

Generate Drive file data from this world_state:

Sub-scenarios (core events):
[
  {
    "id": "planning_meeting_1",
    "type": "planning_meeting",
    "seed": 174020,
    "abstract_description": "Team planning meeting to discuss project progress and next steps",
    "constraints_hint": "Meeting should be scheduled for next week, during working hours (09:00-18:00), with a duration of 45 minutes. All participants must be available.",
    "participants": [
      "person_alex_smith",
      "person_jordan_johnson",
      "person_sam_williams"
    ],
    "time_window": {
      "week_of": "2025-12-01",
      "timezone": "America/New_York",
      "earliest_start": "2025-12-01T09:00:00-05:00",
      "latest_end": "2025-12-05T18:00:00-05:00"
    },
    "final_meeting_details": {
      "title": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps",
      "description": "Planning session to review current Main Product progress, clarify blockers, and plan next sprint work.",
      "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
      "participants": [
        "person_alex_smith",
        "person_jordan_johnson",
        "person_sam_williams"
      ],
      "start_time": "2025-12-03T10:30:00-05:00",
      "end_time": "2025-12-03T11:15:00-05:00",
      "location": "Zoom",
      "calendar_event_id": "cal_evt_main_planning_20251203_1030",
      "conference_link": "https://zoom.us/j/9786543210?pwd=main-product-planning",
      "status": "confirmed"
    },
    "events": [
      {
        "id": "evt_1_slack_initial_ping",
        "type": "slack_message",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T15:05:12-05:00",
        "channel": "proj-main-product",
        "from": "person_alex_smith",
        "to": [
          "person_jordan_johnson",
          "person_sam_williams"
        ],
        "text": "Hey @Jordan @Sam, we should get a planning session on the calendar for next week to sync on Main Product progress and next steps. I’m thinking 45 mins some time between Mon–Wed during the day. Any major conflicts I should avoid?",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_2_email_calendar_hold",
        "type": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T15:22:47-05:00",
        "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
        "to": [
          "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "sam.williams@company.com"
        ],
        "cc": [],
        "subject": "Holding time for Main Product planning (next week)",
        "body": "Hi Jordan and Sam,\n\nFollowing up on Slack, I put a temporary hold on **Wed 12/3 from 10:30–11:15am ET** for a Main Product planning discussion. If this time doesn’t work, reply all with other 45-min windows next week during the workday (9a–6p ET).\n\nThanks,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_3_calendar_tentative_event",
        "type": "calendar_event_created",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T15:24:03-05:00",
        "creator": "person_alex_smith",
        "calendar_event": {
          "id": "cal_evt_main_planning_20251203_1030",
          "title": "Main Product – Planning (tentative)",
          "description": "Tentative hold for Main Product planning sync. 45 min to review progress and plan next steps.",
          "organizer": "person_alex_smith",
          "participants": [
            "person_alex_smith",
            "person_jordan_johnson",
            "person_sam_williams"
          ],
          "start_time": "2025-12-03T10:30:00-05:00",
          "end_time": "2025-12-03T11:15:00-05:00",
          "location": "Zoom",
          "conference_link": "https://zoom.us/j/9786543210?pwd=main-product-planning",
          "status": "tentative"
        },
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_4_slack_availability_jordan",
        "type": "slack_message",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T16:02:31-05:00",
        "channel": "proj-main-product",
        "from": "person_jordan_johnson",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith"
        ],
        "text": "That Wed 12/3 10:30–11:15 ET hold works for me. I’m in another standup right before but should be free at 10:30.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_5_slack_availability_sam",
        "type": "slack_message",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T16:18:09-05:00",
        "channel": "proj-main-product",
        "from": "person_sam_williams",
        "to": [
          "person_alex_smith",
          "person_jordan_johnson"
        ],
        "text": "Works for me as well. I’ve got code freeze tasks that afternoon, so earlier in the day is perfect.",
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_6_calendar_event_status_update",
        "type": "calendar_event_updated",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-25T16:35:42-05:00",
        "editor": "person_alex_smith",
        "calendar_event_before": {
          "id": "cal_evt_main_planning_20251203_1030",
          "title": "Main Product – Planning (tentative)",
          "status": "tentative",
          "start_time": "2025-12-03T10:30:00-05:00",
          "end_time": "2025-12-03T11:15:00-05:00"
        },
        "calendar_event_after": {
          "id": "cal_evt_main_planning_20251203_1030",
          "title": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps",
          "status": "confirmed",
          "start_time": "2025-12-03T10:30:00-05:00",
          "end_time": "2025-12-03T11:15:00-05:00"
        },
        "related_project": "project_main"
      },
      {
        "id": "evt_7_email_agenda_followup",
        "type": "email",
        "timestamp": "2025-11-26T09:12:18-05:00",
        "from": "alex.smith@company.com",
        "to": [
          "jordan.johnson@company.com",
          "sam.williams@company.com"
        ],
        "subject": "Agenda: Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps (Wed 12/3, 10:30–11:15 ET)",
        "body": "Hi both,\n\nThanks for confirming the time. Our planning session is set for **Wed, Dec 3 from 10:30–11:15am ET** (Zoom link in the invite).\n\nProposed agenda:\n1) Quick status check on current Main Product work\n2) Review of open bugs / tech debt\n3) Next sprint priorities and owners\n\nIf there’s anything else you want to cover, reply here and I’ll add it.\n\nBest,\nAlex",
        "attachments": [],
        "related_project": "project_main"
      }
    ]
  }
]

Projects (may reference project-related files):
[
  {
    "id": "project_main",
    "name": "Main Product",
    "type": "software_development",
    "status": "active"
  }
]

Parameters:
- noise_level=0.5: Generate moderate noise
- depth=0.5: Make files moderately indirect

Target schema:
{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "files": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "required": [
          "id",
          "name"
        ],
        "properties": {
          "id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "mimeType": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "content": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "modifiedTime": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Output the complete Drive JSON now.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_main_planning_agenda_20251203",
      "name": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps – Agenda (Dec 3, 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-26T09:05:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps
Date: Wed, Dec 3, 2025
Time: 10:30–11:15am ET
Location: Zoom (see calendar invite for link)
Participants: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

Proposed agenda
1. Quick status check on current Main Product work
   - Progress on current sprint stories
   - Any blockers or cross-team dependencies
2. Review of open bugs / tech debt
   - Current high-priority bugs (e.g., sign-up flow, cross-browser issues)
   - Tech debt items we might include
3. Next sprint priorities and owners
   - Candidate backlog items
   - Owner + ETA
   - Risks / assumptions

Notes
- Please add comments before the meeting with any topics you’d like to cover.
- Meeting owner: Alex Smith"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_planning_notes_20251203",
      "name": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps – Notes 2025-12-03",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-03T11:32:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps – Meeting Notes
Date: Wed, Dec 3, 2025
Time: 10:30–11:15am ET
Location: Zoom
Attendees: Alex Smith (host), Jordan Johnson, Sam Williams

1) Status check on current Main Product work
- Jordan: Signup flow experiment is at ~3.5% lift; wrapping up analysis this week.
- Sam: Performance fixes for dashboard loading are in QA; on track for release early next week.
- Blockers: None critical; some dependencies on Design for onboarding flows.

2) Open bugs / tech debt
- BUG-4312 (Safari-only signup issue): Sam to investigate today; if low lift, patch this sprint.
- Tech debt: Logging improvements deferred to next sprint due to limited capacity.

3) Next sprint priorities and owners
- Finalize onboarding experiment implementation – Owner: Sam
- Cleanup of legacy signup code path – Owner: Jordan
- Add tracking for new pricing page – Owner: Sam (time-boxed)

Action items
- Sam: Confirm scope and fix for BUG-4312 and update Jira by EOD.
- Jordan: Draft next sprint Jira tickets and share with Alex for review by Friday.
- Alex: Update roadmap doc to reflect next sprint focus areas.

Zoom link for reference: https://zoom.us/j/9786543210?pwd=main-product-planning"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_planning_prework_checklist_20251203",
      "name": "Pre-work checklist – Main Product Sprint Planning 2025-12-03",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-26T09:20:00-05:00",
      "content": "Pre-work checklist – Main Product Sprint Planning
Meeting: Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps
Date: Wed, Dec 3, 2025 – 10:30–11:15am ET
Owner: Alex Smith

Purpose
Ensure all participants come prepared with the latest status and priorities so we can finalize the next sprint within 45 minutes.

Checklist
For Jordan
- [ ] Update status for current Main Product experiment in tracking sheet.
- [ ] Review open bugs in the signup area and tag any that are sprint candidates.

For Sam
- [ ] Confirm what’s left for the current code freeze tasks.
- [ ] Review bug queue for browser-specific issues (esp. Safari).

For Alex
- [ ] Draft a proposed list of next sprint priorities.
- [ ] Confirm no conflicts with All-Hands or focus-time blocks.

References
- Calendar event: “Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps” (Dec 3, 10:30–11:15am ET, Zoom)
- Project: Main Product (Jira board + roadmap doc)"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_sprint_backlog_2025_12",
      "name": "Main Product – Sprint Backlog – Dec 2025 (post-planning)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-03T12:00:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: Sprint Backlog – Dec 2025

Columns: [Key, Title, Owner, Status, Priority, Notes]

Rows (excerpt):
- MP-312, "Onboarding experiment implementation", Owner: Sam, Status: Planned, Priority: High, Notes: Aligned with onboarding flow design review outcomes.
- MP-295, "Fix BUG-4312 – Safari-only signup issue", Owner: Sam, Status: In progress, Priority: High, Notes: Identified during bug triage; discussed in 12/3 planning.
- MP-301, "Cleanup legacy signup code path", Owner: Jordan, Status: Planned, Priority: Medium, Notes: Tech debt; partially covered in planning meeting.
- MP-307, "Tracking for new pricing page", Owner: Sam, Status: Planned, Priority: Medium, Notes: Time-boxed; confirm final requirements with Product.

Source: Populated after “Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps” meeting on Dec 3, 2025."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_planning_slide_2025_12_03",
      "name": "Main Product – Planning Overview – Dec 3, 2025",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-02T16:45:00-05:00",
      "content": "Slide 1 – Title
Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps
Wed, Dec 3, 2025 · 10:30–11:15am ET · Zoom
Owner: Alex Smith

Slide 2 – Objectives
- Align on current sprint status
- Decide on critical bug fixes (e.g., Safari signup issue)
- Confirm next sprint scope and owners

Slide 3 – Agenda
1) Status check
2) Bugs & tech debt
3) Next sprint priorities

Slide 4 – Constraints
- 45 minutes only
- Need to avoid conflicts with All-Hands (Dec 4) and Alex’s focus-time blocks

Slide 5 – Next Steps
- Update sprint backlog spreadsheet
- Sync with Design if onboarding dependencies remain"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_main_product_roadmap_focus_brainstorm",
      "name": "Main Product – Roadmap Focus Areas (draft, Nov–Dec 2025)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-02T15:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "Main Product – Roadmap Focus Areas (Draft)
Last edited by Alex Smith during focus time block on Dec 2, 2025 (2–4pm ET).

Context
This draft outlines near-term focus areas feeding into sprint planning (including the Dec 3 “Sprint Planning & Next Steps” session).

Focus themes
1. Onboarding & signup
   - Improve cross-browser reliability (incl. Safari issues like BUG-4312).
   - Experiment with new onboarding flows (see onboarding design review deck).
2. Performance & reliability
   - Dashboard load time improvements.
   - Error handling and logging for critical flows.
3. Monetization
   - New pricing page tracking and experimentation.

Notes
- Use this document as input to the sprint backlog for Dec 2025.
- Planning session on Dec 3 should validate which items move into the sprint."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_design_review_onboarding_mocks_notes",
      "name": "Onboarding Flow Design Review – Notes 2025-11-27",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-27T15:55:00-05:00",
      "content": "Onboarding Flow Design Review – Meeting Notes
Date: Thu, Nov 27, 2025
Time: 3:00–3:30pm ET
Participants: Taylor Brown (Design), Alex Smith (PM)

Agenda
- Review updated onboarding flow mocks for Main Product.
- Confirm alignment with roadmap focus areas.

Discussion (excerpt)
- New multi-step signup reduces initial cognitive load.
- Need to validate behavior on Safari and mobile web.
- Some elements may impact the upcoming sprint planning session on Dec 3.

Action items
- Taylor: Share Figma link and export key screens for the planning meeting.
- Alex: Include onboarding experiment as candidate item for Dec sprint backlog."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_allhands_december_agenda",
      "name": "Company All-Hands – December Agenda",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-24T18:00:00-05:00",
      "content": "Company All-Hands – December
Date: Thu, Dec 4, 2025
Time: 4:00–5:00pm ET
Location: Town Hall + Zoom

Agenda
1. Welcome & announcements
2. Q4 goals progress
3. Product roadmap highlights (incl. Main Product)
4. Q&A

Notes
- Calendar event ID: cal_evt_allhands_20251204_1600
- Recording and slides will be shared afterward in the All-Hands folder."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_allhands_december_slides",
      "name": "December 2025 Company All-Hands – Slides",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-12-04T15:10:00-05:00",
      "content": "Slide 1 – Title
December 2025 Company All-Hands

Slide 2 – Q4 Goals Progress
[Charts and metrics]

Slide 3 – Product Roadmap Highlights
- Main Product: onboarding experiments, performance work
- Other initiatives: [redacted]

Slide 4 – Q&A
- Live Q&A via Zoom and Slido."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_sam_pto_tracker_2025",
      "name": "PTO Tracker – Sam Williams 2025",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-25T10:25:00-05:00",
      "content": "Sheet: PTO 2025 – Sam Williams

      "content": "BUG-4312 – Safari Signup Issue – Investigation Notes
Owner: Sam Williams
Created: Nov 25, 2025

Summary
Users on Safari are intermittently unable to complete signup. Reported via support tickets and monitoring.

Repro steps (initial)
1. Open Main Product signup page in Safari (v17).
2. Fill in required fields.
3. Observe occasional failure after submit.

Initial hypotheses
- Possible SameSite cookie behavior in Safari.
- JS error related to polyfill not loading.

Plan
- Reproduce locally and capture console/network logs.
- If low-lift fix, target current sprint; otherwise propose as candidate for next sprint planning (Dec 3).

Related
- Mentioned in #bugs-main-product Slack thread (Jordan + Sam) on Nov 25.
- To be revisited during “Main Product – Sprint Planning & Next Steps” meeting."
